issue.title: It shouldn't be possible to translate/rotate static models

content.raw: oh gzweb should not need to care about this. If it's `<static>true</true>` it means that it means that dynamics should not be enabled for this model (e.g. no gravity, no forces acting on it, etc) but users should still be able to translate/rotate it.
content.html: oh gzweb should not need to care about this. If it's <static>true</true> it means that it means that dynamics should not be enabled for this model (e.g. no gravity, no forces acting on it, etc) but users should still be able to translate/rotate it.
